name: Lawrence M. OTTER, individually and as Candidate for Bucks County Court of Common Pleas Judge, Appellant v. Pedro A. CORTES, Secretary of the Commonwealth and Chet Harhut, Commissioner of Elections, Appellees

parties: Lawrence M. OTTER, individually and as Candidate for Bucks County Court of Common Pleas Judge, Appellant v. Pedro A. CORTES, Secretary of the Commonwealth and Chet Harhut, Commissioner of Elections, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of April, 2009, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
An opinion will follow.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
969 A.2d 1180
Lawrence M. OTTER, individually and as Candidate for Bucks County Court of Common Pleas Judge, Appellant v. Pedro A. CORTES, Secretary of the Commonwealth and Chet Harhut, Commissioner of Elections, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 7, 2009.
